name: pomodoro-pet
description: 3Dバーチャルペット型ポモドーロタイマー
author: sato1043@updater.cc

scripts.package: npm run licenses && npm run clean:zone && electron-vite build && electron-builder --win
scripts.package:dir: npm run licenses && npm run clean:zone && electron-vite build && electron-builder --win --dir
scripts.test:e2e: VITE_DEBUG_TIMER=3/2/3/2 electron-vite build && xvfb-run --auto-servernum npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: VITE_DEBUG_TIMER=3/2/3/2 electron-vite build && npx playwright test
scripts.deploy:local: rm -rf /mnt/c/temp/pomodoro-pet && mkdir -p /mnt/c/temp/pomodoro-pet && cp -r release/win-unpacked/* /mnt/c/temp/pomodoro-pet/ && cmd.exe /c 'C:\temp\pomodoro-pet\Pomodoro Pet.exe'
scripts.licenses: generate-license-file --input package.json --output licenses/THIRD_PARTY_LICENSES.txt --eol lf --overwrite && cat licenses/ASSET_CREDITS.txt licenses/THIRD_PARTY_LICENSES.txt > licenses/THIRD_PARTY_LICENSES.tmp && mv licenses/THIRD_PARTY_LICENSES.tmp licenses/THIRD_PARTY_LICENSES.txt
